mapper.select: select count(*) from ( select pi.prod_subcode from product p,product_info pi, product_img i where p.prod_subcode = pi.prod_subcode and p.prod_subcode = i.prod_subcode(+) and pi.prod_category1 like '%'|| #{category1} ||'%' and pi.prod_category2 like '%'|| #{category2} ||'%' and p.prod_size ${sizeChk} (${size}) and pi.prod_price between #{minAmount} and #{maxAmount} and nvl(i.prod_mainimg, '1') != '0' group by pi.prod_subcode )

select * from ( select code, code_name from common_code where code_form like 'CATEGORY' || case nvl(#{code_form}, ' ') when ' ' then '_' else #{code_form} || '_1' end order by code_form ) union all select code, code_name from common_code where code = case nvl(#{code_form}, ' ') when '2' then 'TRN' else '' end
select code from common_code where code_form like '%' || #{code_form} || '%'

select min(a.PROD_PRICE) min, max(a.PROD_PRICE) max FROM PRODUCT_INFO a, PRODUCT b where a.prod_subcode = b.prod_subcode and a.prod_category1 like '%'|| #{prod_category1} ||'%' and a.prod_category2 like '%'|| #{prod_category2} ||'%'
